content:
As a result of Russian shelling in the Kherson region, one person was killed in the last day, and another 5 were injured.

About thisreportedKherson Ova Chairman Alexander Proudin.

Last day, the enemy fired at Berislav, Shevchenkivka, Khreschenivka, Antonovka, Stanislav, Wide Beam, Osokorivka, Dniprovske, Mikhailivka, Kachkarivka, Burguna, Republican, Zbradokamyanka, Sadovy, Kizomis, Prydniprovsky.

The Russian military kissed the residential quarters of the settlements of the region, resulting in damaged 2 high -rise buildings, 8 private homes.

Admi -building, preschool, port infrastructure and car were also recorded.

As reported by ArmyInform, Russian troops on Wednesday nightThey were firedSinelnikov district of Dnipropetrovsk region. Previously, 5 people were injured.
title: In Kherson region, through Russian shelling per day, one person was killed, five were injured
description: This was reported by the head of the Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin. Last day enemy ...
author: Army Inform
